snippet.title: KING OF MEAT: Announce Trailer | gamescom 2024
snippet.description:
Allow us to introduce you to the most-watched, sometimes controversial but always talked-about survival gameshow that is always looking for show-offs: KING OF MEAT! Get ready for a joyfully unhinged world filled with skeletons, trolls, and of course, corporate commercialism. 

Are you a Contender ready to destroy anything that steps into the Dungeon? Or are you a Creator, crafting the most devious challenges with your own dungeons? KING OF MEAT allows everyone to express their creativity, so join the mayhem and sign up for future play tests.

SUBSCRIBE TO XBOX: https://xbx.lv/2EEjmaR 

FOLLOW XBOX 
https://twitter.com/xbox 
https://www.facebook.com/xbox 
https://www.instagram.com/xbox/ 
https://www.tiktok.com/@xbox
